Brave3d.overStage (/unique_chucks/38/0x2df5be73b0bf30e1dcb65460ee7e6f6617d709ef.sol#296-359) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- block.number == finishStage.blocknumber

Brave3d.overStage (/unique_chucks/38/0x2df5be73b0bf30e1dcb65460ee7e6f6617d709ef.sol#296-359) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- block.number == finishStage.blocknumber
Brave3d.resetStage (/unique_chucks/38/0x2df5be73b0bf30e1dcb65460ee7e6f6617d709ef.sol#359-363) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _stageMap[rate][curStageIndex - 1].cnt == MAX_PLAYERS

Brave3d.overStage (/unique_chucks/38/0x2df5be73b0bf30e1dcb65460ee7e6f6617d709ef.sol#296-359) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-p3dContract.buy.value(P3D_VALUE * rate)(address(OFFICIAL_P3D)) (/unique_chucks/38/0x2df5be73b0bf30e1dcb65460ee7e6f6617d709ef.sol#342-344)
